# Garden Grove has a New Mayor and Three New Councilmembers!

* * *

![Garden Grove has a New Mayor and Three New Councilmembers!](https://ggcity.org/sites/default/files/video_thumbnails/R3UCqBfvU_Y.jpg)

Posted on: January 16, 2025

Stephanie Klopfenstein is the newly elected Mayor of the City of Garden Grove. She is the first female elected Mayor in the City's history. Phillip Nguyen is sworn in as the Council Member representing District 2. It's part of his American Dream. Yesenia Muñeton wants to impact the community in a positive way from District 5 and Ariana Arestegui is ready to hit the ground running as representative of District 6. They join Councilmembers George Brietigam, Cindy Tran and Joe DoVinh. The City of Garden Grove thanks outgoing Mayor Steve Jones and Councilmembers John O'Neill and Kim Nguyen Penaloza for their hard work and service to the City, its residents and businesses. GGTV3 reporter Breanna Greenup has the story.
